mapper.select: SELECT rownum, a.preperId, a.eCarName, a.email, b.* FROM preperCar a, elecCarInfo b WHERE b.carName = a.eCarName AND a.email = #{email}

SELECT rownum, d.email, d.ecarName, d.addr, e.carCate, e.carCateDetail, e.carBrand, e.carPrice, e.person, e.speed, e.singleWarm, e.singleCold, e.batType, e.batVol, e.govSubsidy, e.make, e.manu, e.link, e.imgUrl, s.locSubsidy, s.govSubsidy, s.sumSubsidy, FROM ( SELECT c.email, c.ecarname, CASE WHEN REGEXP_SUBSTR(c.addr, '[^ ]+', 1, 1) = '서울' THEN '서울특별시' WHEN REGEXP_SUBSTR(c.addr, '[^ ]+', 1, 1) = '세종특별자치시' THEN '세종특별자치시' WHEN REGEXP_SUBSTR(c.addr, '[^ ]+', 1, 1) = '제주특별자치도' THEN '제주특별자치도' WHEN REGEXP_SUBSTR(c.addr, '[^ ]+', 1, 1) IN ('인천', '대전', '광주', '대구', '울산', '부산') THEN REGEXP_SUBSTR(c.addr, '[^ ]+', 1, 1) || '광역시' ELSE REGEXP_SUBSTR(c.addr, '[^ ]+', 1, 2) END as addr FROM ( SELECT a.ecarName, b.email, b.addr FROM preperCar a LEFT JOIN member b ON a.email = b.email WHERE a.email = #{email} ) c ) d LEFT JOIN subsidy s ON d.ecarName = s.carName AND d.addr = s.addrDetail LEFT JOIN elecCarInfo e ON d.ecarName = e.carName LEFT JOIN car_eff_daily ced ON e.carCate = '승용' AND d.addr = ced.addr_detail LEFT JOIN truck_eff_daily ted ON e.carCate = '화물' AND d.addr = ted.addr_detail LEFT JOIN bus_eff_daily bed ON e.carCate = '승합' AND d.addr = bed.addr_detail LEFT JOIN motor_eff_daily med ON e.carCate = '이륜차' AND d.addr = med.addr_detail

SELECT rownum, carName as eCarName, imgUrl FROM elecCarInfo WHERE 1=1
AND UPPER(carName) LIKE '%' || UPPER(REPLACE(#{keyword}, ' ', '')) || '%' AND carName NOT IN ( SELECT ecarname FROM preperCar WHERE email=#{email})
